contentrichtext.text: '''Ivanovo''' may refer to: *[[Ivanovo, Russia]], a city in Russia *[[Ivanovo Oblast]], Russia *"Ivanovo District" - [[Ivanovsky District, Amur Oblast]], a district in [[Amur Oblast]], Russia *"Ivanovo District" - [[Ivanovsky District, Ivanovo Oblast]], a district in [[Ivanovo Oblast]], Russia *[[Ivanovo (Belarus)]], a town in Belarus, a point in [[Struve Geodetic Arc]]-system. ;Balkans *[[Ivanovo (Serbia)]], a village in Serbia. *[[Ivanovo (Croatia)]], a village in [[Viljevo Municipality]], Croatia *[[Ivanovo, Blagoevgrad Province]] in [[Blagoevgrad Province]], Bulgaria *[[Ivanovo, Haskovo Province]] in [[Haskovo Province]], Bulgaria *[[Ivanovo, Shumen Province]] in [[Shumen Province]], Bulgaria *[[Ivanovo, Smolyan Province]] in [[Smolyan Province]], Bulgaria *[[Ivanovo, Rousse Province]] in Rousse Province, Bulgaria *[[Ivanovo Municipality]] in Rousse Province, Bulgaria {{geodis}}
